ingredients: 1 (14 ounce) can Swanson® Seasoned Chicken Broth with Roasted Garlic
title: Garlic Herb Grilled Chicken
instructions:
Pour broth into shallow nonmetallic dish. Add chicken and turn to coat. Cover and refrigerate 15 minutes. Remove chicken from broth.
Grill chicken 15 minutes. or until done, turning and brushing often with broth. Discard remaining broth.
